lead_paragraph: The Boston Red Sox dramatically retooled to build anew after winning the World Series in 2013, but on Tuesday they revised the blueprint again to go all-in for another title chase.

headline.print_headline: Red Sox 'Go for It' With Trade for Lefty Ace Sale
headline.main: Red Sox 'Go for It' With Trade for Lefty Ace Sale

snippet: The Boston Red Sox dramatically retooled to build anew after winning the World Series in 2013, but on Tuesday they revised the blueprint again to go all-in for another title chase....
